channel.title: [PI] NPC locations
channel.description: I just got a new source and I'm trying to smooth out some glitches my friend is having, but I've encountered a problem; I cannot find where NPC locations are stored and created, so I am unable to move his shops. all help is appreciated :3

item.title: [PI] NPC locations
item.dc:creator: @Mr.czar Mr.czar
item.description:
@Mr.czar wrote:

spawn-config.cfg

All NPC spawns are in there, and can be moved with the correct coordinates.

Read full topic
